comments.author: Maus0728
comments.body: You don't necessarily need to report the post individually. You could indicate a comment saying "Please check the user's post history, where he mostly spam in bounty threads.". From there, you'll be saving a lot of time and your report won't be repeated on the moderator's end making both your job easier and without you worrying the report limitation.
